for_sales.sales_text:
Golden Nomad is a very sea kindly stable boat and can be sailed comfortably in cooler weather. A Cornish Crabber Pilot Trader, built 1981 by Cornish Crabbers, Rock, Cornwall. Much loved and updated over the last 25 years by her present owners.

LOD: 30ft+bowsprit, beam: 9ft 6in, draft: 3ft 6in plate up. New main mast 2014, new mizzen 2010, re-rigged 2013. New jib furling foil 2013, new Maxwell electric windlass 2013. New sails 2008, good electronics. Engine: Yanmar 30hp 2008.

Hot water is supplied to the galley and heads basin and shower by a calorifier when the engine is running and an immersion heater when hooked up. A Sterling battery charger is fitted.

Several 13amp sockets fitted through. Ample warps, boat hooks and fenders.

boat.full_description:
Golden Nomad is a very sea kindly stable boat and can be sailed comfortably in cooler weather. She has a peat burning stove fitted and a small oil filled electric radiator for use when hooked up to shore power. Hot water is supplied to the galley and heads basin and shower by a calorifier when the engine is running and an immersion heater when hooked up.

After spending many years based in Belfast, Northern Ireland, she was brought to Rye, Sussex in 2018.
boat.name: Golden Nomad
boat.short_description: Golden Nomad is a Cornish Crabber Pilot Trader, built and fitted out in 1981 by Cornish Crabbers, Rock, Cornwall. She is a gaff rigged ketch. 30ft. on deck, the largest boat built by Cornish Crabbers.
